content.raw:
I do see this error without a9816ea due to startup issue:

~~~
hx_robot_info() Service call timed out.
/home/hsu/projects/haptix/handsim_osrf/test/regression/86_motor_values.cc:74: Failure
Value of: hxOK
  Actual: 0
Expected: hx_robot_info(&robot_info)
Which is: 1
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:118] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] Issue86Test.MotorLimits (2875 ms)
~~~
